In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X H : forall i : nat, 0 < i <= n -> f i = u Unable to unify "∑ ?M1442 ?M1443 = ?M1443 ?M1444" with "∑ (n + 2) f = f 0 ⊕ f (S n)".
